experiences.title: Team Lead
experiences.subtitle: Innovative Code Labs Pvt. Ltd.
workDescription: Worked on 4 projects (marketplaces)
Implemented Search functionality using **Algolia**
Implemented Chatting Module (frontend + backend) using **socket.io**
Worked on integration of stripe ACH payments & payouts system in marketplace
Developing APIs and performing **CRUD** operations to enable efficient data management
Collaborating closely with clients to understand their requirements and tailored development accordingly
**Technology**: MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js), **Sharetribe** (low code platform), **AWS S3**, **AWS Lambda**, **Stripe**

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Bridging Technology Pvt. Ltd.
workDescription: Developed **Advertising Framework**, **Storefront Optimization**, **Multiple Payment Gateways**  and **Guiding Tour** functionalities.
Led frontend development for the **InternetTV** module.
Implemented APIs and performed CRUD operations for seamless data management.
Utilized MERN stack, **GraphQL**, and **microservices architecture** to enhance platform performance and scalability.
Leveraged Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, and GraphQL for efficient data management and retrieval.
Tech Involved: **NodeJS**, **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, **Redux**, **GraphQL**, **Videojs**, **React Joyride**, **Jest** Unit Testing
